description:
ValiDate is a visual novel about 13 struggling singles navigating through soul-sucking 9-to-5s, quarter-life crises, and the harsh truths millennials learn as soon as they hit their 20â€™s.

Set in the Jercy City area, our cast of lovers trudge through the dregs of capitalism - a journey, a transition - a rite-of-passage that leads into uncertain mid-adulthood. On one side but not yet out on the other, our first volume's four playable characters, Malik, Inaya, Isabelle, and Emhari, find romance amongst cosplay, trash mixtapes, and even poetry straight from the soul.

With 28+ routes to choose from and hours of content, the lives of these singles are in your good (or bad!) decision-making hands."
name: ValiDate: Struggling Singles in your Area
intro: ValiDate is a romantic visual novel about 13 adults in Jercy City navigating new relationships and the harsh realities that come alongside them.
